両日: (りょうじつ) - both days; two days
両替商: (りょうがえしょう) - money-exchange business
両替手数料: (りょうがえてすうりょう) - commission for an exchange
両棲動物: (りょうせいどうぶつ) - amphibious animal
両極: (りょうきょく) - both extremities; North and South Poles; positive and negative poles
両極地方: (りょうきょくちほう) - polar areas
両極端: (りょうきょくたん) - both extremes
両様: (りょうよう) - two ways; both ways; two kinds
両洋: (りょうよう) - Orient and Occident; Atlantic and Pacific
両為: (りょうだめ) - for the benefit of both parties
両生動物: (りょうせいどうぶつ) - amphibious animal
両生綱: (りょうせいこう) - Amphibia; class comprising the extant and extinct amphibians
両界曼荼羅: (りょうかいまんだら) - Mandala of the Two Realms
両睨み: (りょうにらみ) - keeping a close watch on both sides; keeping an eye on two things at the same time
両立: (りょうりつ) - compatibility; coexistence; standing together
両立直: (ダブルリーチ) - {mahj}  declaring that one is one tile away from winning on one's first discard and before any tiles have been called or kongs declared
両端: (りょうはじ) - both ends/either end/both edges; (りょうたん only) double-mindedness/sitting on the fence
両義: (りょうぎ) - double meaning; two meanings; amphibolous
両翼: (りょうよく) - both wings; both flanks
両者: (りょうしゃ) - pair; the two; both persons; both things
両職を兼ねる: (りょうしょくをかねる) - to hold two offices concurrently
両肌: (りょうはだ) - both bare shoulders; stripped to the waist
両脚器: (りょうきゃくき) - pair of compasses; compass (for drawing circles, etc.)
両脚規: (りょうきゃくき) - pair of compasses; compass (for drawing circles, etc.)
両舷: (りょうげん) - both sides of a ship
両蓋時計: (りょうぶたどけい) - hunting-case watch
両虎: (りょうこ) - two tigers; two rivals
両議院: (りょうぎいん) - both houses of parliament
両足: (もろあし) - both feet; (りょうあし only) both legs
両軍: (りょうぐん) - both armies; both teams
両部: (りょうぶ) - two parts/both parts; both realms (i.e. the Diamond Realm and the Womb Realm); Shinto-Buddhist amalgamation
両部神道: (りょうぶしんとう) - Shinto-Buddhist amalgamation; dual-aspect Shinto
両陛下: (りょうへいか) - Their Majesties; the Emperor and Empress
両院: (りょういん) - both Houses of Parliament
両院制: (りょういんせい) - bicameral constitution; bicameralism; bicameral system
両院協: (りょういんきょう) - joint committee of both houses
両院協議会: (りょういんきょうぎかい) - joint committee of both houses
両院合同協議会: (りょういんごうどうきょうぎかい) - joint sitting of both houses (parliament, congress)
両雄並び立たず: (りょうゆうならびたたず) - if two ride upon a horse, one must sit behind; when Greek meets Greek, then comes the tug of war; two great rivals cannot coexist
両面: (リャンメン) - {mahj}  double-sided wait (for one's last tile); wait for either of two different tiles to complete a chow which will finish one's hand
両面ディスク: (りょうめんディスク) - double-sided disk
両面作戦: (りょうめんさくせん) - (yoji) operations (a strategy) on two fronts; two-pronged strategy
両面刷り: (りょうめんずり) - printing on both sides
両面待ち: (リャンメンまち) - {mahj} double-sided wait (for one's last tile); wait for either of two different tiles to complete a chow which will finish one's hand
両頭政治: (りょうとうせいじ) - diarchy; dyarchy
両鬢: (りょうびん) - sideburns; hair at the sides of the head
並: (ei/nami/nara) - line-up , average, medium, common, ordinary; mid-grade (item), regular grade; same level as, equal to, equivalent to, on par with; each (e.g. month), every
並いる: (なみいる) - to sit in a row; to be present (and lined up)
並びない: (ならびない) - unparalleled; unparallelled; unequaled; unequalled; unique
並びに: (ならびに) - and (also); both ... and; as well as
並び変える: (ならびかえる) - to reorganize; to rearrange; to put (things) in order
並び大名: (ならびだいみょう) - someone who has a title but no real duty/useless person; (original meaning)  actor playing a daimyo who merely sets the scene as part of the background (in kabuki)
並び替える: (ならびかえる) - to reorganize; to rearrange; to put (things) in order
並び無い: (ならびない) - unparalleled; unparallelled; unequaled; unequalled; unique
並び無き: (ならびなき) - unparalleled; unparallelled; unequaled; unequalled; unique
並び立つ: (ならびたつ) - to stand in a line/to stand in a row; to be equal
並ぶ: (narabu) - entrar na fila, ficar na fila; rivalizar, igualar, equiparar
